resources.string: NOT ASSOCIATED OR APPROVED BY MOJANG

- Improve performance in version 0.14.3.
- Simplify the interface with only essential buttons being functional, while the rest are purely decorative.
- Implement the UI from the Windows 10 Edition.
- Introduce a new graphics pack.
- Add a new splash animation.

- Change the interface to resemble the Java launcher.
- Add an in-game music menu (similar to a hack menu).
- Add a list of active servers for version 0.14.x.
- Implement the UI from the PS3 version of Minecraft.
- Update the functionality of buttons.
- Modify the texture of the poison icon.

- Completely change the Launcher to be as similar to the Java launcher as possible.
- Open multiple versions of Minecraft.
- Add the ability to download skins.
- Add classic Minecraft music.
- Modify the game's user interface to match the current interface.
- Add language switching for players from different countries.
- Add lightweight shader effects for weaker devices.
- Implement a store feature for downloading skin packs and additional maps from the store.

• BUG FIXES •
- Fix inaccuracies with cloud effects.
- Fix issues with Chat not hiding.

- Update version 0.15.4
- Windows 10 GUI for Minecraft
- MarketPlace Update
- Remove launcher
- Change webview for skins button
- Allow to change player name in settings
- Save your account to get into the game quickly

• Bug Fix •
- Some blocks have not had their texture changed

- Cursor support
- New Settings
- Official Web update
- Language Update 70%

- Remake Launcher
- Market Place
- Download Multiversion
- Fix UI
- Removed Herobrine
Use beta version of the Launcher
Use Your LastFom Account to Login in Minecraft
